page.title: 12EDUCATION IN WHARFEDALE
page.content: The village,{Threshfield}is served by two schools.{Upper Wharfedale County {Secondary School,}catering for an age range from 11 to 16 and{Threshfield {Non Provided Voluntary Maintained {Primary school,}catering for the age range 4+ to 11. The administrative centre for the county is{County Hall,Northallerton, although the local administration of schools is based at the{Education {Offices in Skipton.}Here the office is run by the{Area Education Officer}and his assistants.There are also a number of{County Advisers}who liase and assist with schools. Children attending the{Primary School are subject to selection at 11+ and depending upon the results of a locally administered test they transfer to either{Upper Wharfedale}or to the{Grammar School}in{Skipton.
